title: This Bert Show Member Told His Mom About His Medications For The First Time
description:
This Bert Show member traveled with his mom over the weekend and had a long talk and a deep heart-to-heart (which is not normal for him) with his mom...and opened up about something he was doing in his life that she had no clue about.
